features: 5 Straws: WATERH Vita straw replacement, Stanley straw replacement, Owala straw replacement, Simple Modern straw replacement, Hydro Flask Replacement Straws. (Can be cut to fit most stainless steel tumbler with Straw replacement)
Advanced Filtration Technology: The PureSip Filter is made of top-trade activated carbon, reduces chlorine and particulates. Meet NSF/ANSI 42, 53 & 401 standards.
Reduce your Carbon Footprint: This filter helps you reduce your carbon footprint by replacing up to 450 single-use plastic bottles (11 oz).
No Compromise on Flow: This filter instantly filters water as you sip through the bottle straw without compromising its flow.
Long-lasting Life: One WATERH PureSip Filter can last up to 2 months and can filter up 40 gallons of tap water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenience and Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: As an avid fitness enthusiast who values staying hydrated, I recently purchased the Waterh Bf02 Water Bottle Filter with Straw as an accessory for my water bottle. With the increasing concerns about the quality of tap water, I wanted a reliable solution to ensure I was drinking clean and refreshing water during my workouts. I must say, this filter has exceeded my expectations. The installation process is a breeze. With its compatibility with popular water bottle brands like WaterhB002, Simple Modern, Qwala, Stanley, and Hydro Flask, I found it incredibly easy to attach the filter to my existing water bottle. The package includes one filter and five replacement straws, providing excellent value for money. The convenience factor of this water bottle filter is unmatched. With the built-in straw, I no longer have to tilt my water bottle to drink water while exercising or on the go. The straw delivers a steady flow of water, allowing me to stay hydrated without any hassle. It has truly become an essential companion during my workouts. One of the most significant improvements I noticed after using this filter is the enhanced taste of my water. The filter effectively removes impurities and unpleasant odors, leaving me with fresh and clean-tasting water. It's reassuring to know that I am consuming healthier water, free from potentially harmful substances.Overall, I am highly satisfied with the Waterh Bf02 Water Bottle Filter with Straw. Its ease of installation, convenience, and ability to improve the taste of my water have made it an indispensable accessory in my fitness routine. If you are someone who values clean and refreshing hydration, I highly recommend giving this water bottle filter a try. It's a small investment that will make a significant difference in your drinking experience. Stay hydrated and enjoy the benefits of this fantastic product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pratical product for our daily drinking
reviews.reviewText: I usually pay lots of attention to my private health, especially my daily drinking water. As the rising problem concerning the quality of our daily drinking water, this filter is quite necessary for our daily needs.I use this replacement instead of single-use plastic bottles, which helped me to save some money. Once I bought this product, it also has been a huge win for me in my efforts to reduce my carbon footprint without wasting plastic bottles.1 filter and 5 straws are included that is quite practical. The straws are durable and could be cut to fit my different size tumblers. I used the filter for 4 weeks with 7 glasses of water a day on average, the level of the water quality tested by my water testing pen is still quite high.I’d like to buy one for my best friend as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ensures convenience for the user experience
reviews.reviewText: This filter employs advanced filtration technology to effectively reduce the levels of chlorine and particulate matter in water, meeting industry standards. It can serve as a sustainable alternative to disposable plastic bottles. What sets it apart from other filters is its ability to instantly filter water through the bottle straw while maintaining flow. This clever design ensures convenience for the user experience. The enduring filtration efficacy provides users with a more economical and environmentally friendly option. The inclusion of five straws allows compatibility with bottles from other brands, offering additional alternatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars high-performance and convenient
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with my experience using the PureSip Adapt Water Bottle Filter with Straw. It provides a perfect alternative straw and filter for my other branded water bottles, eliminating the need to buy different accessories for each bottle. The design of this water filter bottle is simple yet efficient, and the filter effectively removes odors and impurities from the water. The straw's design makes the drinking process convenient, and it is easy to clean, maintaining the purity of the water. The package includes 1 filter and 5 straws, bringing convenience and health to my life. It is a reliable water filter worth trusting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: My previous filter was long in use and needed to be replaced. This filter is very good quality and has been a very good product for me. It filters out impurities from the water. The filtered water, does not have any odor. The taste of the filtered water is also very good. It fits well with my water bottle and comes with 5 straws. It should be noted that it needs to be replaced after 2 months of use. All in all, it filters well. I like it very much. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exceeds my expectations.
reviews.reviewText: This PureSip Adapt Filter is made with top-quality activated charcoal and is certified to effectively reduce chlorine and particles in water. Using this filter allows you to confidently enjoy fresh and delicious water without worrying about any unpleasant odors. The filter can also reduce carbon footprint, and the water flow is exceptionally smooth, ensuring it does not impact the drinking experience. One filter can last up to 2 months, filtering 40 gallons of tap water – highly satisfying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to install and does clean the water
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle filter is good for traveling. It was easy to install into the bottle, and ensures that every sip is clean and refreshing, removing impurities and improving the taste of water from various sources. I have taken it for several days, and it does a good job. There also come with several straws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The water bottle filter was easy to apply to most bottles. Its design combines convenience and sustainability, allowing you to sip clean, filtered water wherever your adventures take you. The straws are long enough to cut for fitting a bottle. I 'd like to take it when I am hiking or traveling.

reviews.reviewTitle: Useful idea, needs a little work.
reviews.reviewText: I'm no survivalist... I'm not even a camper. But I do live in the country where power outages sometimes cause water to be unavailable. That's when something like this would come in handy for me, just on the off chance I need to use water from a questionable source. As such, this is a handy kit to have on hand. It's mostly easy to assemble, and comes with two different sizes of straws that should fit most standard water bottles.The filter does not change the taste of the water in any noticeable way. You do have to remember not to set the filter right at the bottom of your bottle, or it can't draw any water in. Then you can just fill your bottle and go with your clean water.The only problem I have with this system...and I think it's significant...is that the straws are made from a very stiff plastic and are hard to attach to your water bottle. Even though two of the straws are 8 mm, the same gauge as my water bottle, I was not able to get them on. Fortunately, the straw from my bottle was able to fit into the filter, so I could use it . It would be much better if the straws were made from a slightly more flexible plastic so they could be attached more easily.This one will be going into storage for now, against the day when I will actually need it. It will be helpful knowing it's there.

reviews.reviewTitle: Transforming Your Favorite Bottles into Hydration Heroes
reviews.reviewText: The WATERH PureSip Adapt is a game-changer for anyone seeking to elevate their hydration experience with a twist of innovation and sustainability. This water bottle straw replacement and filter combo have seamlessly integrated into my favorite bottles, turning them into powerful hydration companions that go beyond the ordinary.The standout feature of the PureSip Adapt is its versatility. Designed to fit popular bottles like WATERH Vita, Simple Modern, Owala, Stanley, Hydro Flask, and more, it's a universal solution that breathes new life into your existing bottle collection. The adaptability of the PureSip ensures that I can enjoy its benefits without compromising on my preferred bottle brand.The inclusion of a filter is a remarkable addition. This filter not only purifies water but also enhances the taste, ensuring that every sip is crisp and refreshing. Whether I'm filling up from a tap or a questionable water source during outdoor adventures, the PureSip filter acts as a reliable safeguard, providing clean and great-tasting water on the go.The stainless steel tumbler with straw is a testament to both durability and style. The high-quality materials ensure that my drink stays cool, and the straw provides a convenient and mess-free sipping experience. The pack includes not just one, but five straws, offering a generous supply for extended use.Installation of the PureSip Adapt is a breeze, and the secure fit ensures that the straw and filter stay in place, even during vigorous activities. The adaptability of this system has revolutionized the way I hydrate, allowing me to enjoy the benefits of the PureSip without committing to a specific bottle brand.

For $27, this is a nice starter kit for anyone who wants a portable means of accessing filtered water on the go.I've always been one that has trouble drinking sufficient water every day... I tend to favour coffee, juice, or flavoured water. Recently I noticed that mindlessly sipping from a straw cup while working from home at my computer desk is the best way for me to hydrate with plain water. Even then, even though I was drinking more than I used to, I was struggling to drink 1 large bottle/day.Last night, I got this to attach to my insulated tumbler that has an opening large enough for the widest straw that came with this kit. Setup was very quick and easy. I sipped away while watching TV with my family, and before I knew it, I had gone through 2 large bottles of water within 2 hours!The water tastes amazingly refreshing with this straw! It's designed to go in travel bottles, but it's so easy to transfer and use in any cup that you want to drink from with a straw.I did download the free WaterH app, thinking it would help me track my water consumption and filter life. However, unless you own one of their branded smart water bottles, it won't do much more than other generic water tracking apps.All in all, I am very happy to have found something so simple that will help me stay hydrated regularly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would be even better with an adapter to use in any kind of bottle
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept of filtered water on the go. I drink only filtered water at home. Even though our local water is decent, I prefer to eliminate any chlorine taste. On the go sometimes like at the gym I need to refill my bottle and wish it was better quality. I got this to try during those occasions. I haven’t actually tried the water with it yet because it doesn’t work in the shaker bottles I use. It sort of bobs in the water since it doesn’t hold to any straw in the lid. I still want to try it but was trying to come up with a better solution/or a more suitable bottle.I can’t attest to the water quality. It’s a bit odd in their description they mention it will be good for 2 months or 40 gallons of tap water. I don’t know how much water you all drink but 40 gallons is a lot! Not sure about their numbers for gallons, probably the 2 months is more accurate. We’ll see.It comes with multiple straws you can adjust to the size of your bottle.Giving it provisional 4 stars pending testing!If it does what it says 27$ is a decent price for the convenience factor.

The WATERH Puresip adapter with straws comes in a pack with a box of 5 straws and a filter that is an adapter that adds onto the straw. There are different sizes of straws that allows you to use it in different types of bottles. It was easy to put together and doesn't add a lot of weight to the bottle.Staying hydrated by drinking more water is one of my goals for 2024 and it will be a lot more achievable to have a worry free way to drink from water sources.The filter ensures the water you are drinking tastes really refreshing and you don't need to worry about the quality of the tap water you are drinking. The filter is said to last for 2 months and/or 40 gallons of water, which is a lot of water. It replaces a lot of single use water bottles which will be better for the environment. It is also better for you due to the ability to filter out metals, chlorine, and other harmful things that can potentially be in water.
